title: Contemporary sans serif / slab serif combination
author: jilljill

comments.content:
"MONDAY SPARKS" is **AutoScape** by Cornel Windlin [1998]:  
 [http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142318/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/ "http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/")

The slab serif looks very close to **[Rockwell](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142318/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/rockwell/)**
